sourcesContent:
import { NavLink, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; import { useContext, useEffect, useState } from "react"; import Category from "../components/Category"; import useFetch from '../../hooks/UseFetch' import { category } from "../../api"; import Context from "../../state/Context"; function SideBar() { const { quantityComicArchive, quantityComicHistory } = useContext(Context) const [isShowCategory, setIsShowCategory] = useState(false) const [isShowSearchPopup, setIsShowSearchPopup] = useState(false) const [searchQuery, setSearchQuery] = useState("") const { pathname } = useLocation() const [data] = useFetch(category) const navigate = useNavigate() useEffect(() => { isShowCategory ? document.body.style.overflowY = 'hidden' : document.body.style.overflowY = 'auto' }, [isShowCategory]) useEffect(() => { if (isShowSearchPopup) { document.body.style.overflowY = 'hidden' } else { document.body.style.overflowY = 'auto' } }, [isShowSearchPopup]) const handleSearch = (e) => { e.preventDefault() if (searchQuery.trim()) { navigate(`/search/${searchQuery.trim()}`) setSearchQuery("") setIsShowSearchPopup(false) } } return (
setSearchQuery(e.target.value)} className="w-full py-2 px-2 rounded-[8px] bg-[#e8ebed] dark:bg-[rgba(204,204,204,0.2)] text-[#000] dark:text-[#fff] text-xs focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#10b981] placeholder:text-xs" />
  • Trang chủ
  • Mới nhất
  • Kho lưu trữ {quantityComicArchive > 0 &&
    {quantityComicArchive}
    }
  • Lịch sử {quantityComicHistory > 0 &&
    {quantityComicHistory}
    }
  • setIsShowCategory(true)}>
    Thể loại
  • setIsShowSearchPopup(true)}>
    Tìm kiếm
{isShowCategory && } {/* Advanced Search Popup */} {isShowSearchPopup && (
setIsShowSearchPopup(false)} className="cursor-pointer p-[6px] text-[#000] dark:text-[#fff] lg:text-2xl mobile:text-xl fa-solid fa-xmark" >

Tìm kiếm nâng cao

setSearchQuery(e.target.value)} className="w-full py-3 px-4 pr-10 rounded-[8px] bg-[#e8ebed] dark:bg-[rgba(204,204,204,0.2)] text-[#000] dark:text-[#fff] focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#10b981]" autoFocus />
)}
); } export default SideBar;
